name: Treats v0.1 (beta)
description:
You or a loved one play as an anthropomorphic bunny, your task is simple: to collect flowers and solve puzzles to proceed on your quest. The world isn't as scary as you might anticipate - but sometimes it can be difficult to distinguish what to be afraid of.

~

This is you.

~

Information regarding the game:

This is the first stage of an ongoing project and is currently a WIP, but halloween was here and we couldn't wait. There is a lot missing that has yet to be added, and more assets, minigames, music, and puzzles will appear in subsequent releases.

~

Controls

Currently the controls have been mapped to:

I, J, K, L - movement (D-pad)

Return - Action/confirm

Rshift - Back/Pause menu

Esc - quit immediately

~

Music - Polygon Cove, Skeletondoggy

Art and Animation - Mewtowo
